College Lecturer, St Catherine's College
Student, Pembroke College
andr...@cs.ox.ac.uk

LayoutNode.Content: Wolfson Building, Parks Road, Oxford OX1 3QD
LayoutNode.SRC: Wolfson Building, Parks Road, Oxford OX1 3QD

LayoutNode.Content: I am currently a research student under the supervision of Professor Ian Horrocks and Dr. Bernardo Cuenca Grau, and a member of the Knowledge Representation and Reasoning group. Previously, I received my MCompSci from the University of Oxford in 2012.
